search.enter-to-search-web: Press enter to search the web

config.heading: Configuration Options
config.backup-note: It is recommended to make a backup of your configuration before making changes.
config.reset-config-msg-l1: This will remove all user settings from local storage, but won't effect your 'conf.yml' file.
config.reset-config-msg-l2: You should first backup any changes you've made locally, if you want to use them in the future.
config.reset-config-msg-l3: Are you sure you want to proceed?
config.data-copied-msg: Config has been copied to clipboard
config.css-note-l1: You will need to refresh the page for your changes to take effect.
config.css-note-l2: Styles overrides are only stored locally, so it is recommended to make a copy of your CSS.
config.css-note-l3: To remove all custom styles, delete the contents and hit Save Changes

updates.unsupported-version-l1: You are using an unsupported version of Dashy
updates.unsupported-version-l2: For the best experience, and recent security patches, please update to

theme-maker.title: Theme Configurator
theme-maker.copied-toast: Theme data for {theme} copied to clipboard

config-editor.success-msg-disk: Config file written to disk successfully
config-editor.success-note-l2: This may take up to a minute.
config-editor.success-note-l3: You will need to refresh the page for changes to take effect.
config-editor.error-msg-save-mode: Please select a Save Mode: Local or File
config-editor.not-admin-note: You cannot write changed to disk, because you are not logged in as an admin

app-rebuild.title: Rebuild Application
app-rebuild.rebuild-note-l1: A rebuild is required for changes written to the conf.yml file to take effect.
app-rebuild.rebuild-note-l2: This should happen automatically, but if it hasn't, you can manually trigger it here.
app-rebuild.rebuild-note-l3: This is not required for modifications stored locally.
app-rebuild.rebuilding-status-2: This may take a few minutes
app-rebuild.error-permission: You don't have permission to trigger this action
app-rebuild.reload-note: A page reload is now required for changes to take effect

cloud-sync.title: Cloud Backup & Restore
cloud-sync.intro-l1: Cloud backup and restore is an optional feature, that enables you to upload your config to the internet, and then restore it on any other device or instance of Dashy.
cloud-sync.intro-l2: All data is fully end-to-end encrypted with AES, using your password as the key.
cloud-sync.intro-l3: For more info, please see the
cloud-sync.backup-id-note: This is used to restore from backups later. So keep it, along with your password somewhere safe.
cloud-sync.backup-error-password: Incorrect password. Please enter your current password.

item.copied-toast: URL has been copied to clipboard

menu.edit-page-info-tooltip: App title, description, nav links, footer text, etc.
menu.save-locally-tooltip: Save config locally, to browser storage. This will not affect your config file, but changes will only be saved on this device
menu.save-disk-tooltip: Save config to the conf.yml file on disk. This will backup, and then over-write your existing config
menu.export-config-tooltip: View and export new config, either to a file, or to clipboard
menu.cloud-backup-tooltip: Save encrypted backup of configuration to cloud
menu.edit-raw-config-tooltip: View and modify raw config via JSON editor
menu.cancel-changes-tooltip: Reset current modifications, and exit Edit Mode. This will not affect your saved config
menu.edit-mode-description: This means you can make modifications to your config, and preview the results, but until you save, none of your changes will be preserved.

edit-section.edit-tooltip: Click to Edit, or right-click for more options
edit-section.remove-confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this section? This action can be undone later.

edit-app-config.warning-msg-l1: The following options are for advanced app configuration.
edit-app-config.warning-msg-l2: If you are unsure about any of the fields, please reference the

export.copy-clipboard-tooltip: Copy all app config to system clipboard, in YAML format
export.download-file-tooltip: Download all app config to your device, in a YAML file

glances.system-load-desc: Number of processes waiting in the run-queue, averaged across all cores

tfl-status.good-service-rest: Good Service on all other Lines
